content.raw:
Is version 1.9 required? I believe [erb exists in 1.8](http://ruby-doc.org/stdlib-1.8.7/libdoc/erb/rdoc/ERB.html). Also, the default version of ruby on osx is 1.8.7.

UPDATE: I just tried compiling against ruby 1.8 and I think the API is different. Looking into it…
~~~
src/parser.cc:888:21: error: no member named 'as' in 'RString'
  if (RSTRING(ret)->as.heap.ptr != NULL)
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~  ^
src/parser.cc:889:33: error: no member named 'as' in 'RString'
    result.assign(RSTRING(ret)->as.heap.ptr, RSTRING(ret)->as.heap.len);
                  ~~~~~~~~~~~~  ^
2 errors generated.
~~~
content.html:
Is version 1.9 required? I believe erb exists in 1.8. Also, the default version of ruby on osx is 1.8.7.

UPDATE: I just tried compiling against ruby 1.8 and I think the API is different. Looking into it…
